name: Virtual_creature.exe
description:
Press F then F11 as soon as you enter the game in order to toggle fullscreen (REALLY RECOMMANDED FOR IMMERSION)

A fast-made virtual desktop, mix of windows XP and windows 8, make you discover a new way of using your laptop.

Now you can feed a creature in this user-nonfriendly game, and make it evolve into different stages.

(find the secret ending:)

You cannot save nor load, you lose all progression when you close the game. You will need patience in order to fully finish the game.

Never forget that alt+F4 lets you close a running program

Wear headphones for optimal experience.
